thread.title: Photos: You Have To See How Priyanka Chopra Celebrated Holi!
thread.title_full: Photos: You Have To See How Priyanka Chopra Celebrated Holi!

author: Divya Rao
title: Photos: You Have To See How Priyanka Chopra Celebrated Holi!
text:
Divya Rao Mar . 14 . 2017 Priyanka Chopra (Source: GettyImages.in) 
Despite spending days and months in Hollywood, our desi girl Priyanka Chopra always finds a way to stay connected to India – whether it’s through food or through festivals like Diwali and Holi – she always gets her crew to celebrate with her. PC was on The Jimmy Fallon Show last night and she got the host Jimmy Fallon to celebrate Holi with her! How cool is that? Here are photos. A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Mar 13, 2017 at 3:28pm PDT A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Mar 13, 2017 at 3:32pm PDT A post shared by @heycathb on Mar 13, 2017 at 5:02pm PDT A post shared by nadine (@_nadeen77) on Mar 13, 2017 at 5:02pm PDT PS – She also got her crew to play with her. A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Mar 13, 2017 at 4:35pm PDT A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Mar 13, 2017 at 4:36pm PDT A post shared by @ranbir_deepika_shahid_priyanka on Mar 13, 2017 at 6:03pm PDT Do me a favour, let’s play Holi! A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Mar 12, 2017 at 7:18am PDT 
What fun!
